HED01.name: Hedione
HED01.description: A jasmine-like molecule that adds radiance and freshness to floral compositions.

ISO01.name: Iso E Super
ISO01.description: A smooth, velvety woody note with a slight cedar scent, often used as a base note.

AMB01.name: Ambroxan
AMB01.description: A rich, musky-amber note with a warm, sensual character.

LIM01.name: Limonene
LIM01.description: A fresh, zesty citrus note commonly found in lemon and orange peels.

GER01.name: Geraniol
GER01.description: A rose-like floral note commonly found in essential oils.

CIT01.name: Citral
CIT01.description: A fresh, lemony note found in citrus oils.

COU01.name: Coumarin
COU01.description: A sweet, vanilla-like scent with hints of freshly cut hay.

GAL01.name: Galaxolide
GAL01.description: A sweet, powdery musk note often used in modern perfumery.

EUG01.name: Eugenol
EUG01.description: A warm, spicy note reminiscent of clove, often used in oriental fragrances.

CAL01.name: Calone
CAL01.description: A marine, ozonic note that evokes the scent of sea breeze and fresh air.
